DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical efficacy mouthwash base natural product ( Schinus terebinthifolius ) use child gingivitis .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Study Mouthwash Based Schinus Terebinthifolius Treat Gingivitis Children
DOC.criteria: Age group : 1012 year old Presence least 20 dental element Do use orthodontic fixed appliance Simplified Oral Hygiene Index ( SOHI ) great 2 Levels Microbiological Streptococcus mutans saliva high ( > 10,000 CFU / mL ) ( JENSEN ; BRATTHALL , 1989 ) Susceptibility form biofilm gingival inflammation Absence systemic disease Not use antiseptic mouthwash last 3 month
